text: Approval for the Medtronic AVE (AVE) S670 with Discrete Technology(TM) Over-The Wire Coronary Stent System.  The device is indicated for improving coronary luminal diameter in patients with symptomiatic ischemic heart disease due to discrete de novo lesions (length <30 mm) in native coronary arteries with reference vessel diameters ranging from 3.0 and 4.0 mm.  Long term outcome (beyond 14 days) for this permanent implant is unknown at present.
